mapper.select: SELECT t.actual_complete_date as actualCompleteDate, t.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, t.content, t.create_company_id as createCompanyId, t.create_company_name as createCompanyName, t.create_date as createDate, t.create_org_id as createOrgId, t.create_org_name as createOrgName, t.create_person_id as createPersonId, t.create_person_name as createPersonName, t.delflag, t.duty_dept as dutyDept, t.duty_dept_id as dutyDeptId, t.duty_user as dutyUser, t.duty_user_id as dutyUserId, t.expect_complete_date as expectCompleteDate, t.id, t.remark, t.report, t.report_status as reportStatus, t.task_package_id as taskPackageId, t.tend_id as tendId, t.update_date as updateDate, t.update_person_id as updatePersonId, t.update_person_name as updatePersonName, t.work_schedule_id as workScheduleId FROM oa_schedule_task_package_dispatch t where t.delflag=0 and t.task_package_id=#{taskPackageId}
